tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: pros:1.will patiently listen to you2.will slowly make you understand and try to instill confidence in you3.will not scare like other doctors.4.give you ample time, space and proper guidance to avoid any issues5.least amount of medicines and treatment. gives enough chance to the body to recover6. friendlycons:nothing noticable.
Dr Prashant is excellent and I am visiting him since 2016 and never felt to consultation from another Dr since then for orthopedic and muscular issues

It was great experience with Dr. Patil, I had my ACL reconstruction done in BBSR, but after 1.5 yr also I was not fit to play, I was feeling pain as well, then I met with Dr Prashanth Patil ,he explained the situation such a nice way and planned my treatment with surgery to physio rehabilitation then after 6 weeks I felt a lot better to go for all activities and now its a year I am into fully sports.I am so thankful to Dr.Patil that today he brought back my old days,when once I thought there will be lot restriction in my activities and I cant be able to do any sports. 
Along with his treatment he is a wonderful person, he explains everything very clearly that brings extra confident.

His availability is 3-5 pm. Since there were no patients around 3, he refused to stay back for an appointment at 4 pm. 

Great people serving in the noble industry!

Doctor explaining the solutions for the problem is good.

I'm dissatisfied with showing consultation fee in practo is 400 and they collected 700 from me.

Visited for Elbow surgery.

The doctor did a good work, during lockdown of June 2020, we were having difficulty in finding a good doctor, glad that we found him on time.

review: The doctor understood my problem well and had a pretty quick diagnosis of the root cause. With a first line of treatment based on purely exercises, he ensures that the patients feel at ease with him.
